target_markets.market_description: AI video production for large companies
pain_points: lack of knowledge on AI video creation

problems_validated.severity: high for those seeking viral marketing
problems_validated.market_gap: lack of understanding and tools for AI video creation

business_strategies.strategy: Create viral AI videos for large companies
business_strategies.implementation: Use a step-by-step workflow involving scripting, Chat GPT, Figma, and animation tools
business_strategies.expected_results: Increased engagement and views for client ads
business_strategies.case_study: David Beckham ad with 230 million views

problems_solutions.solution: Use humor and recognizable IP to engage viewers

startup_ideas.problem_solved: Lack of education on AI video production
startup_ideas.validation: High engagement from directors in comments

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not using humor in AI video ads
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Origin Financial ad with 2 million views

growth_tactics.tactic: Create humorous and engaging AI video ads

actionable_quotes.quote: We don't like to gatekeep the sauce.
actionable_quotes.actionability: Encourages open sharing of strategies and tools

comment_insights.insight: Directors see value in AI video production education
